scripts.ci:version: pnpm pretty && changeset version && pnpm clean
scripts.clean: pnpm dlx rimraf "**/{node_modules,dist,.next,coverage}" pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm i
scripts.dev:cjs:all: bob-esbuild tsc && concurrently pnpm:dev:core pnpm:dev:cjs:express pnpm:dev:cjs:fastify pnpm:dev:cjs:http pnpm:dev:cjs:koa pnpm:dev:cjs:hapi pnpm:dev:next
scripts.dev:cjs:express: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/express dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3001 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-express dev:cjs"
scripts.dev:cjs:fastify: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/fastify dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3002 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-fastify dev:cjs"
scripts.dev:cjs:hapi: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/hapi dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3003 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-hapi dev:cjs"
scripts.dev:cjs:http: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/http dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3004 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-http dev:cjs"
scripts.dev:cjs:koa: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/koa dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3005 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-koa dev:cjs"
scripts.dev:mjs:all: bob-esbuild tsc && concurrently pnpm:dev:core pnpm:dev:mjs:express pnpm:dev:mjs:fastify pnpm:dev:mjs:http pnpm:dev:mjs:koa pnpm:dev:mjs:hapi pnpm:dev:next
scripts.dev:mjs:express: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/express dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3001 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-express dev:mjs"
scripts.dev:mjs:fastify: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/fastify dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3002 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-fastify dev:mjs"
scripts.dev:mjs:hapi: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/hapi dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3003 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-hapi dev:mjs"
scripts.dev:mjs:http: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/http dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3004 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-http dev:mjs"
scripts.dev:mjs:koa: pnpm -r --filter @graphql-ez/koa dev -- --onSuccess "cross-env PORT=3005 pnpm -r --filter example-complete-koa dev:mjs"
scripts.prepare: husky install && bob-esbuild tsc && pnpm -r prepack
